title: Founding Farmers | King of Prussia Town Center Restaurant
description: Located in the center of the lively King of Prussia Town Center, Founding Farmers KOP is a full-service restaurant and bar open every day serving breakfast, lunch, dinner & weekend brunch.
cleaned_text: Founding Farmers King of Prussia Located in the center of the lively King of Prussia Town Center, Founding Farmers KOP is a full-service restaurant and bar open every day. As a farmer-owned restaurant, almost all of our delicious food and drink - including [our proprietary spirits](http://www.farmersrestaurantgroup.com/about/beverages/) - is made from scratch using high-quality ingredients from American family farms. A beloved greater Philadelphia Go-To restaurant, we won Best Brunch from Philadelphia's Main Line Today magazine and are continually recognized for our sustainability efforts, earning a Green Restaurant Association certification and LEED Gold certification from the U.S. Green Building Council. Founding Farmers King of Prussia honors our country's founding fathers and mothers who strategically grew crops, experimented with seeds, and researched new possibilities for food sources. These Founding Farmers knew that agriculture held the key to self-sufficiency and our country's independence. Our urban Pennsylvania farmhouse celebrates our nation's Founding Farmers, our family farmer-owners - the [North Dakota Farmers Union](http://www.ndfu.org/) - and many of our suppliers. In designing Founding Farmers KOP, we found inspiration in the beautiful surrounding countryside and the nearby, historically significant Valley Forge and the King of Prussia Inn. We commissioned a diverse group of artists to help us tell our story and some of the early history of Pennsylvania and our nation. Located in the center of the lively King of Prussia Town Center, Founding Farmers KOP is a full-service restaurant and bar open every day. Our First Bake Cafe & Creamery, located on the first floor, serves light fare, fresh baked breads, our delicious Farmers Donuts, our house-roasted Founding Farmers coffee, and our famous house-churned ice cream. On Saturdays & Sundays, you can now experience our full-service cafe & bakery for a la carte breakfast (8am-12pm) and lunch (12pm-4pm). 5% WELLNESS CHARGE: We believe hospitality begins with a healthy team and a stable, equitable work environment. To ensure both, a 5% surcharge is added to all dine-in checks that supports free mental health resources for our teams and their families, access to health insurance, paid sick leave, and increased operating costs. It is not a gratuity. Our goal is to be transparent while maintaining the value and standards our guests have come to know and love. We appreciate your support and kindness. If you would prefer, we will remove the charge upon request. To learn more specifics about this charge, please see [A Message to Our Guests](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/a-message-to-our-guests/). Frequently Asked Questions Amenities Do you have a private event space? Yes! The General's Parlor is our 24-seat private dining room located off our main dining room. [Learn more here.](http://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/private-group-dining-at-founding-farmers-king-of-prussia/) How may I purchase gift cards? Founding Farmers gift cards go beyond enjoying a great meal. Our gift cards make the perfect gift for anyone in your life who loves getting together with friends and family over a delicious food & drink. [Purchase a Founding Farmers gift card](https://farmersrestaurantgroup.cardfoundry.com/giftcards.php) for your loved ones today. Our gift cards CAN be used for: - Dining in all seven of our restaurants. - Delivery and pick up from all seven of our restaurants when ordered online directly via [order.farmersrestaurantgroup.com](https://order.farmersrestaurantgroup.com). This includes hot, ready-to-eat holiday meals (for pick up and delivery) when ordered directly via [order.farmersrestaurantgroup.com](https://order.farmersrestaurantgroup.com). - Purchasing our merchandise in person, such as The Founding Farmers Cookbook, our Founding Farmers Coffee, and our Founding Farmers Chocolate. You can also use our gift cards in person to purchase Founding Spirits from our DC distillery plus our DC and MD restaurants. Our gift cards CANNOT be used for: - Ordering from third party platforms, such as UberEats, DoorDash, and GrubHub. - Purchasing our merchandise online to ship, including The Founding Farmers Cookbook or Founding Spirits. - Our special holidays at home programs (meals that can pre-ordered for reheating at home), such as: Rosh Hashanah, Yom Kippur, Thanksgiving, Christmas, New Year's Eve, Valentine's Day, Passover, Easter, and Mother's Day. How well can Founding Farmers King of Prussia accommodate someone with a disability? All of our restaurants are well equipped to provide excellent hospitality for all of our guests. Please let us know if you have any access concerns or needs in dining with us. You can make note when making your [online reservation](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/reservations), [contact us](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/contact) in advance of your reservation, or let us know when you arrive. Just outside Philadelphia in the King of Prussia Town Center, Founding Farmers King of Prussia is located on the second floor with access via an elevator or stairs. (The first floor is our First Bake Cafe & Creamery, which also has some counter seating, several cafe tables, and a seasonal outdoor patio.) There are multiple free parking lots and street parking surrounding the restaurant. We offer valet parking in the evenings. Is there a dress code? We like to think of ourselves as smart casual. We are what you want to make us... casual, sporty, post-King of Prussia Town Center shopping excursion - we love it all! Do you have an elevator? Yes, there is an elevator to bring guests from the first level to the main dining room. Do you have WiFi? Yes, we offer complimentary WiFi. Please check with your server or the host for the password. Are there other Founding Farmers locations? Yes, we hope you will visit all of the restaurants in our growing family. In making your plans, please note that each restaurant has different offerings, amenities, and operating times: [Founding Farmers DC](http://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/location/founding-farmers-dc/)- Foggy Bottom, 1924 Pennsylvania Ave NW, Washington, DC [Founding Farmers & Distillers DC](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/location/founding-farmers-distillers/)- 600 Massachusetts Avenue NW, Washington, DC [MoCo's Founding Farmers](http://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/location/mocos-founding-farmers/)- Park Potomac, Potomac, MD [Founding Farmers Tysons](http://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/location/founding-farmers-tysons/)- Reston Plaza Drive, Reston, VA [Founding Farmers King of Prussia](http://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/location/founding-farmers-king-of-prussia/)- 255 Main Street, King of Prussia, PA [Farmers Fishers Bakers](http://www.farmersfishersbakers.com/)- The Washington Harbour, Georgetown Waterfront, DC Do you have highchairs and/or booster seats? Yes, we do have highchairs and booster seats available for your convenience. Where is the closest parking? Parking can be found directly behind the restaurant and throughout the KOP Town Center lots. Additionally, there is a free parking garage directly next to LA Fitness and complimentary valet parking offered 7 days a week starting at 4pm, located on the corner of Main Street and Town Square Place. [KOP_ParkingMap_V3](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/KOP_ParkingMap_V3.pdf) Are you currently hiring? Yes, we are hiring for all of our locations. Check out all available positions [here](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/jobs/). Do you cater? Yes. [Founding Farmers Co. Catering & Events](https://nam02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.foundingfarmerscatering.com%2F&data=05%7C01%7CErin%40FRG.Farm%7Cf6f8c41ffc454f1e850e08da7a4a5f7d%7Cabe3bc5477294bfca1601e9ca81f2f06%7C0%7C0%7C637956757096026863%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=kVNYQ6ymPITHMYZDGEzRQqKQr0fXXLkbuLTse%2B9lEhg%3D&reserved=0) can provide full service catering, delivery and pick up catering that can be ordered directly online, private chef diners, and event planning. With years of experience rooted in restaurant hospitality, we have the expertise and bandwidth to help you create events that are easy, frictionless, and fun to plan from start to finish. Our catering menus are not limited to our restaurant food & drink but can be tailored to your event and your budget. As with our restaurants, everything is made from scratch with ingredients thoughtfully sourced from farmers and suppliers we know and trust. Complete details on our catering services and how to collaborate with us for your next event can be found at [Founding Farmers Co. Catering & Events](https://nam02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.foundingfarmerscatering.com%2F&data=05%7C01%7CErin%40FRG.Farm%7Cf6f8c41ffc454f1e850e08da7a4a5f7d%7Cabe3bc5477294bfca1601e9ca81f2f06%7C0%7C0%7C637956757096183052%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=N8NHB%2FhJgepA2wMHoUv4ETKjJs0kXe3lL6HyeZOlGaA%3D&reserved=0). Bar & Beverage Are there TVs in the bar area? We have small televisions located in our bar area. However, they are not easily viewed from all parts of the bar and are not advisable for viewing sporting events. Do you have a happy hour? Every hour is happy here! While we don't have a traditional happy hour or offer discounted pricing on our cocktails, we do provide the best possible pricing with the freshest and best ingredients for each handcrafted cocktail. Do you have bar seating? Yes, we do. What is your corkage fee? Guests may bring in one bottle of wine per party without a corkage fee. A $25 fee for each additional bottle applies after that and any wines brought into the restaurant may not be included on our current wine list. Brunch Do you have bottomless brunch drinks? We do not offer bottomless drinks for brunch, but we have amazing pre-prohibition style eye-opener libations that are sure to please! For your weekend brunch, do you have a buffet or a la carte menu service? Please check our [locations pages for each restaurant](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/locations/) for the most up-to-date information on when and where we are providing our a la carte menus or our buffet brunch service, as well as where we are currently able to serve you — on our patios or in our dining rooms. [Founding Farmers DC](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/location/dc/) - [A la Carte Breakfast/Brunch Menu](https://nam02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wearefoundingfarmers.com%2Fmenus%2F%3Fmoco%2Fbreakfast-brunch&data=04%7C01%7CErin%40FRG.Farm%7Cc7c483459aab415be69f08d8b7f46cda%7Cabe3bc5477294bfca1601e9ca81f2f06%7C0%7C0%7C637461607722940554%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=y1dX0Sq776bXEaCDBvvOg75MTRrc2o7ESQwvm4bM46I%3D&reserved=0) with full service. [Founding Farmers Tysons](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/location/reston/) - Farmers Market BUFFET Brunch Menu.](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/menus/?tysons/weekend-buffet-brunch) [Founding Farmers Reston Station](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/location/reston/) - Our [ Farmers Market Brunch Menu](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/menus/?reston-station/sunday-buffet-brunch) with our [A la Carte Breakfast/Brunch Menu](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/menus/?reston-station/saturday-breakfast-brunch) available in our bar area on Saturdays. [Founding Farmers King of Prussia](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/location/king-of-prussia/) - Our [ Farmers Market BUFFET Brunch Menu](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/menus/?king-of-prussia/indoor-weekend-buffet-brunch) is available for our indoor diners seated upstairs. We have an a la carte weekend breakfast/brunch menu for our street-level cafe tables, reservable through "experiences" on OpenTable. [Farmers & Distillers](https://farmersanddistillers.com/) — Our [ Farmers Market Indoor Buffet Brunch Menu](https://farmersanddistillers.com/menu/brunch/) is available. [Farmers Fishers Bakers](https://www.farmersfishersbakers.com/faqs-covid-19/) — Our [Farmers Market Brunch Menu](https://www.farmersfishersbakers.com/menus/weekend-brunch/) is available indoors. Desserts & Celebrations Can I bring in my own cake? Yes, we love celebrations! Cakes, cupcakes, or pies may be brought into the restaurant, however there is a $2 per person dessert fee for every person in your party when doing so, regardless of who is having or not having dessert. Can I order a whole cake? We wish you would! Yes, you can order one of our original recipe, made-from-scratch, whole cakes & pies [online here](https://order.farmersrestaurantgroup.com). When ordering whole pies, cakes, and cheesecakes, please allow 36 hour advance notice. If you're within that window, call us to see if we can accommodate. Whole desserts are not available through third party online platforms. Do you offer a free dessert for a birthday or some other type of celebration? We are not able to provide a free dessert for celebrations but when making a reservation, you can pre-order a special dessert from the menu for the guest of honor and we can provide an acknowledgement of the celebration. What is Founding Farmers First Bake Cafe & Creamery? Founding Farmers First Bake Cafe & Creamery is located on the first floor of Founding Farmers King of Prussia. This 50-seat cafe, creamery, and bakery makes everything from scratch, from ice cream and cakes to donuts, bagels, pizza, and more. It's the perfect stop to pick up some goodies to take home or stay and enjoy a quick lunch! How may I purchase gift cards? Founding Farmers gift cards go beyond enjoying a great meal. Our gift cards make the perfect gift for anyone in your life who loves getting together with friends and family over a delicious food & drink. [Purchase a Founding Farmers gift card](https://farmersrestaurantgroup.cardfoundry.com/giftcards.php) for your loved ones today. Our gift cards CAN be used for: - Dining in all seven of our restaurants. - Delivery and pick up from all seven of our restaurants when ordered online directly via [order.farmersrestaurantgroup.com](https://order.farmersrestaurantgroup.com). This includes hot, ready-to-eat holiday meals (for pick up and delivery) when ordered directly via [order.farmersrestaurantgroup.com](https://order.farmersrestaurantgroup.com). - Purchasing our merchandise in person, such as The Founding Farmers Cookbook, our Founding Farmers Coffee, and our Founding Farmers Chocolate. You can also use our gift cards in person to purchase Founding Spirits from our DC distillery plus our DC and MD restaurants. Our gift cards CANNOT be used for: - Ordering from third party platforms, such as UberEats, DoorDash, and GrubHub. - Purchasing our merchandise online to ship, including The Founding Farmers Cookbook or Founding Spirits. - Our special holidays at home programs (meals that can pre-ordered for reheating at home), such as: Rosh Hashanah, Yom Kippur, Thanksgiving, Christmas, New Year's Eve, Valentine's Day, Passover, Easter, and Mother's Day. Do you cater? Yes. [Founding Farmers Co. Catering & Events](https://nam02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.foundingfarmerscatering.com%2F&data=05%7C01%7CErin%40FRG.Farm%7Cf6f8c41ffc454f1e850e08da7a4a5f7d%7Cabe3bc5477294bfca1601e9ca81f2f06%7C0%7C0%7C637956757096026863%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=kVNYQ6ymPITHMYZDGEzRQqKQr0fXXLkbuLTse%2B9lEhg%3D&reserved=0) can provide full service catering, delivery and pick up catering that can be ordered directly online, private chef diners, and event planning. With years of experience rooted in restaurant hospitality, we have the expertise and bandwidth to help you create events that are easy, frictionless, and fun to plan from start to finish. Our catering menus are not limited to our restaurant food & drink but can be tailored to your event and your budget. As with our restaurants, everything is made from scratch with ingredients thoughtfully sourced from farmers and suppliers we know and trust. Complete details on our catering services and how to collaborate with us for your next event can be found at [Founding Farmers Co. Catering & Events](https://nam02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.foundingfarmerscatering.com%2F&data=05%7C01%7CErin%40FRG.Farm%7Cf6f8c41ffc454f1e850e08da7a4a5f7d%7Cabe3bc5477294bfca1601e9ca81f2f06%7C0%7C0%7C637956757096183052%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=N8NHB%2FhJgepA2wMHoUv4ETKjJs0kXe3lL6HyeZOlGaA%3D&reserved=0). Food Do you serve breakfast? We offer a full-service breakfast on weekdays. We also have our First Bake Cafe on the first floor offering quick-service items. On weekends, we offer our brunch service. [Learn more about our weekend brunch here.](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/brunch-faq/) Can you accommodate specific food allergies (nuts, dairy, gluten, seafood, etc.)? Yes, in most cases. Our servers and chefs are trained to address food allergies and can offer menu variations. However, if you have a life-threatening food allergy which can be triggered by cross-contact, our restaurant may not be right for you—we cook almost everything from scratch and therefore the avoidance of cross-contact is not something we can guarantee with 100% certainty. If you have an allergy of this severity, please call ahead to discuss with us, as we may determine it is safest you dine elsewhere. For non-cross contact allergies, we kindly request that you provide your server with any allergy or dietary concerns before you order, and your server will help you select an item that does not contain your allergen; we will not remove an allergen from dish as that can lead to errors, but we will absolutely help you select the best dish for you. Do you have a kids menu? One of the best things about [our menu](http://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/menus/) is that we try to offer a little something for every taste bud out there. We have many "kid-approved" items on our regular menus, and our service team is happy to help you choose the best item for the children in your party. Do you offer vegan and vegetarian options? Our menus feature many vegetarian options, and our servers can recommend options for our vegan guests, making modifications whenever possible. Please note: modifications are not as available for our Farmers Market Buffet Brunch. You can see all of our most current menus here: [https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/menus/](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/menus/) Please be sure to mention any dietary concerns to your server. What kind of food do you serve? Founding Farmers is owned by more than 50,000 American family farmers of the North Dakota Farmers Union and is supplied daily by hundreds of family farms everywhere. We offer our versions of all-American and farmhouse classics with modern interpretations and preparations. [Our focus](http://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/about/) is to provide our guests with the freshest, highest quality ingredients that have been grown and harvested, and then expertly prepared by our talented chefs from scratch every day. View [our menus](http://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/menus/). What time do you start serving lunch? Lunch service begins at 11am Monday - Friday and runs through the late afternoon; the lunch and dinner menu are the same. On Saturdays, Sundays, and holiday Mondays, lunch begins at 2pm on our 2nd floor dining room and 12pm for our street level. Our Farmers Market Buffet Brunch is served until 2pm for our 2nd floor level diners; street-level dining offer an a la carte brunch menu until 12pm on Saturdays and Sundays. Do you cater? Yes. [Founding Farmers Co. Catering & Events](https://nam02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.foundingfarmerscatering.com%2F&data=05%7C01%7CErin%40FRG.Farm%7Cf6f8c41ffc454f1e850e08da7a4a5f7d%7Cabe3bc5477294bfca1601e9ca81f2f06%7C0%7C0%7C637956757096026863%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=kVNYQ6ymPITHMYZDGEzRQqKQr0fXXLkbuLTse%2B9lEhg%3D&reserved=0) can provide full service catering, delivery and pick up catering that can be ordered directly online, private chef diners, and event planning. With years of experience rooted in restaurant hospitality, we have the expertise and bandwidth to help you create events that are easy, frictionless, and fun to plan from start to finish. Our catering menus are not limited to our restaurant food & drink but can be tailored to your event and your budget. As with our restaurants, everything is made from scratch with ingredients thoughtfully sourced from farmers and suppliers we know and trust. Complete details on our catering services and how to collaborate with us for your next event can be found at [Founding Farmers Co. Catering & Events](https://nam02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.foundingfarmerscatering.com%2F&data=05%7C01%7CErin%40FRG.Farm%7Cf6f8c41ffc454f1e850e08da7a4a5f7d%7Cabe3bc5477294bfca1601e9ca81f2f06%7C0%7C0%7C637956757096183052%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=N8NHB%2FhJgepA2wMHoUv4ETKjJs0kXe3lL6HyeZOlGaA%3D&reserved=0). Getting Here & Parking Where is the closest parking? Parking can be found directly behind the restaurant and throughout the KOP Town Center lots. Additionally, there is a free parking garage directly next to LA Fitness and complimentary valet parking offered 7 days a week starting at 4pm, located on the corner of Main Street and Town Square Place. [KOP_ParkingMap_V3](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/KOP_ParkingMap_V3.pdf) Where is the restaurant located? [Founding Farmers King of Prussia](http://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/location/founding-farmers-king-of-prussia/) is located in the King of Prussia Town Center at [255 Main Street, King of Prussia, PA](https://www.google.com/maps/place/255+Main+Street+%23180,+King+of+Prussia,+PA+19406/@40.0835265,-75.408052,16.96z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x89c6944380533e93:0x380740dd35e46cdf!8m2!3d40.0835275!4d-75.4057401) 19406. The restaurant entrance is on Main Street. How well can Founding Farmers King of Prussia accommodate someone with a disability? All of our restaurants are well equipped to provide excellent hospitality for all of our guests. Please let us know if you have any access concerns or needs in dining with us. You can make note when making your [online reservation](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/reservations), [contact us](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/contact) in advance of your reservation, or let us know when you arrive. (The first floor is our First Bake Cafe & Creamery, which also has some counter seating, several cafe tables, and a seasonal outdoor patio.) There are multiple free parking lots and street parking surrounding the restaurant. We offer valet parking in the evenings. Are there other Founding Farmers locations? Yes, we hope you will visit all of the restaurants in our growing family. In making your plans, please note that each restaurant has different offerings, amenities, and operating times: [Founding Farmers DC](http://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/location/founding-farmers-dc/)- Foggy Bottom, 1924 Pennsylvania Ave NW, Washington, DC [Founding Farmers & Distillers DC](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/location/founding-farmers-distillers/)- 600 Massachusetts Avenue NW, Washington, DC [MoCo's Founding Farmers](http://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/location/mocos-founding-farmers/)- Park Potomac, Potomac, MD [Founding Farmers Tysons](http://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/location/founding-farmers-tysons/)- Reston Plaza Drive, Reston, VA [Founding Farmers King of Prussia](http://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/location/founding-farmers-king-of-prussia/)- 255 Main Street, King of Prussia, PA [Farmers Fishers Bakers](http://www.farmersfishersbakers.com/)- The Washington Harbour, Georgetown Waterfront, DC Large Parties Do you have a private event space? Yes! The General's Parlor is our 24-seat private dining room located off our main dining room. [Learn more here.](http://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/private-group-dining-at-founding-farmers-king-of-prussia/) Who do I contact if I want to make a reservation for a large party (more than 10 guests)? For parties over the size of 10, please [fill out this form](https://foundingfarmers.tripleseat.com/party_request/19127). You will generally receive a response within 24-48 hours. Please note that due to our weekend Farmers Market Buffet Brunch set up, the largest party we can accept during Saturday and Sunday brunch is a party of eight. Weekend dinner parties with 10+ may only be accommodated in [our private dining room, The General's Parlor](http://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/private-group-dining-at-founding-farmers-king-of-prussia/). Do you cater? Yes. [Founding Farmers Co. Catering & Events](https://nam02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.foundingfarmerscatering.com%2F&data=05%7C01%7CErin%40FRG.Farm%7Cf6f8c41ffc454f1e850e08da7a4a5f7d%7Cabe3bc5477294bfca1601e9ca81f2f06%7C0%7C0%7C637956757096026863%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=kVNYQ6ymPITHMYZDGEzRQqKQr0fXXLkbuLTse%2B9lEhg%3D&reserved=0) can provide full service catering, delivery and pick up catering that can be ordered directly online, private chef diners, and event planning. As with our restaurants, everything is made from scratch with ingredients thoughtfully sourced from farmers and suppliers we know and trust. Complete details on our catering services and how to collaborate with us for your next event can be found at [Founding Farmers Co. Catering & Events](https://nam02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.foundingfarmerscatering.com%2F&data=05%7C01%7CErin%40FRG.Farm%7Cf6f8c41ffc454f1e850e08da7a4a5f7d%7Cabe3bc5477294bfca1601e9ca81f2f06%7C0%7C0%7C637956757096183052%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=N8NHB%2FhJgepA2wMHoUv4ETKjJs0kXe3lL6HyeZOlGaA%3D&reserved=0). Reservations Can I just arrive for a meal or do I need to make a reservation? Reserve your table or come on in. Our [full menus ](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/menus/)are available for weekday breakfast, lunch, dinner, and weekend brunch. Is there a dress code? We like to think of ourselves as smart casual. We are what you want to make us... casual, sporty, post-King of Prussia Town Center shopping excursion - we love it all! Who do I contact if I want to make a reservation for a large party (more than 10 guests)? For parties over the size of 10, please [fill out this form](https://foundingfarmers.tripleseat.com/party_request/19127). You will generally receive a response within 24-48 hours. Please note that due to our weekend Farmers Market Buffet Brunch set up, the largest party we can accept during Saturday and Sunday brunch is a party of eight. Weekend dinner parties with 10+ may only be accommodated in [our private dining room, The General's Parlor](http://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/private-group-dining-at-founding-farmers-king-of-prussia/). Can I add my name to the wait list over the phone? Unfortunately, we cannot take names over the phone for the wait list. To be fair to all guests, if you are unable to [make a reservation](http://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/reservations/), then you must arrive in person to put your name on the wait list. Do you have a cancellation policy? No, we do not have a cancellation policy. We take all reservations in good faith, that our guests will inform us at the earliest possible convenience if a cancellation or change in party size is necessary. So, if you have a change, please let us know! How long is the grace period if I'm running late for my reservation? We get it, stuff happens. We offer a grace period of 15 minutes. If you arrive after the 15-minute grace period, even with a phone call, you may be subjected to the wait list simply to be fair to all of our guests. How well can Founding Farmers King of Prussia accommodate someone with a disability? All of our restaurants are well equipped to provide excellent hospitality for all of our guests. Please let us know if you have any access concerns or needs in dining with us. You can make note when making your [online reservation](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/reservations), [contact us](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/contact) in advance of your reservation, or let us know when you arrive. Just outside Philadelphia in the King of Prussia Town Center, Founding Farmers King of Prussia is located on the second floor with access via an elevator or stairs. (The first floor is our First Bake Cafe & Creamery, which also has some counter seating, several cafe tables, and a seasonal outdoor patio.) There are multiple free parking lots and street parking surrounding the restaurant. We offer valet parking in the evenings. Are there other Founding Farmers locations? Yes, we hope you will visit all of the restaurants in our growing family. In making your plans, please note that each restaurant has different offerings, amenities, and operating times: [Founding Farmers DC](http://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/location/founding-farmers-dc/)- Foggy Bottom, 1924 Pennsylvania Ave NW, Washington, DC [Founding Farmers & Distillers DC](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/location/founding-farmers-distillers/)- 600 Massachusetts Avenue NW, Washington, DC [MoCo's Founding Farmers](http://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/location/mocos-founding-farmers/)- Park Potomac, Potomac, MD [Founding Farmers Tysons](http://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/location/founding-farmers-tysons/)- Reston Plaza Drive, Reston, VA [Founding Farmers King of Prussia](http://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/location/founding-farmers-king-of-prussia/)- 255 Main Street, King of Prussia, PA [Farmers Fishers Bakers](http://www.farmersfishersbakers.com/)- The Washington Harbour, Georgetown Waterfront, DC What if I have an outdoor reservation, and/or it is raining or there is a forecast for inclement weather? Learn more about each [locations' patios here](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/founding-farmers-winter-patios/). If you make a reservation on one of our patios - with or without a cover - please check the forecast (for rain or cold temperatures) for your reserved time and [contact us](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/contact-us/) if you need to change your reservation. To serve you safely on our patios and inside our restaurants, we are continuing to follow government regulations for reduced capacity and social distancing. What is the 5% Wellness Charge? We believe hospitality begins with a healthy team and a stable, equitable work environment. To ensure both, a 5% surcharge is added to all dine-in checks that supports free mental health resources for our teams and their families, access to health insurance, paid sick leave, and increased operating costs. It is not a gratuity. Our goal is to be transparent while maintaining the value and standards our guests have come to know and love. We appreciate your support and kindness. If you would prefer, we will remove the charge upon request. We appreciate your continued support by dining in our restaurants. To learn more specifics about this charge, please see [A Message to Our Guests](https://nam02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wearefoundingfarmers.com%2Fa-message-to-our-guests%2F&data=05%7C01%7CMMurphy%40FRG.Farm%7C039f816454d8450104c608db7184d79f%7Cabe3bc5477294bfca1601e9ca81f2f06%7C0%7C0%7C638228587611243839%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=yE4REQVzs1KUwcatTL1nLsAlPqKrCkQX9v8pYtWqlEw%3D&reserved=0). What guests should know prior to dining with us regarding COVID-19 operations? Your health and well-being are the utmost important to us. We are following local government regulations and CDC guidelines. We appreciate your support in helping to keep everyone as safe as possible. Masks are currently optional for our guests and our team members at all of our locations. We will continue encourage vaccination, educate our team members, and track COVID cases. Join Us For A Meal Our dining rooms and [patios](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/outdoor-dining/) are open. Reserve your table or come on in. Our [full menus ](https://nam02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wearefoundingfarmers.com%2Fmenus&data=04%7C01%7CErin%40FRG.Farm%7C1730920c46b14c95b85b08d90513eb83%7Cabe3bc5477294bfca1601e9ca81f2f06%7C0%7C0%7C637546405385301656%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=3KRnLhKXIyyYFcxj9T44RUMHJbqLlxJ4reWw5XiUGVA%3D&reserved=0)are available for weekday breakfast, lunch, dinner, and weekend brunch. Getting Here GETTING HERE Founding Farmers KOP is located in the King of Prussia Town Center. We are near the Valley Forge National Historical Park and King of Prussia Mall. How to Reach Founding Farmers KOP from Philadelphia Take the Schuylkill Expressway (I-76) or the Pennsylvania Turnpike (I-76 to the west and I-276 to the east) to King of Prussia via the Valley Forge interchange from points west such as Harrisburg and Pittsburgh and points east such as the northern suburbs of Philadelphia, New Jersey, and New York City. From Center City, Philadelphia, get on I-676 (Vine St Expressway), then go I-76 towards Valley Forge. After proceeding on I-76 get off at the King of Prussia exit. From the suburbs of Philadelphia, take the Pennsylvania Turnpike towards Harrisburg, then proceed to the Valley Forge exit. How to Reach Founding Farmers KOP from Delaware County If you are coming from Delaware County, take the I-476 N and then take I-76 W to E Swedesford Rd in King of Prussia. Take exit 327-328A-328B from I-76 W. How to Reach Founding Farmers KOP from Bucks County Follow I-476 S and I-276 W to Village Drive in King of Prussia. How to Reach Founding Farmers KOP from Norristown Route 202 provides access to King of Prussia from West Chester to the south and from Norristown to the north. U.S. Route 422 provides access to King of Prussia from Pottstown, Reading, and other communities along the Schuylkill River to the northwest. Founding Farmers KOP is a short drive from Wayne, Mainline, Berwyn, Norristown, Oaks, Conshohocken, and Radnor. Stop in for a bite today! PARKING Parking can be found directly behind the restaurant and throughout the KOP Town Center lots. Additionally, there is a free parking garage directly next to LA Fitness and complimentary valet parking offered 7 days a week starting at 4pm, located on the corner of Main Street and Town Square Place. [KOP_ParkingMap_V3](https://www.wearefoundingfarmers.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/KOP_ParkingMap_V3.pdf) ACCESSIBILITY All of our restaurants are well equipped to provide excellent hospitality for all of our guests. Please let us know if you have any access concerns or needs in dining with us. You can make note when making your online reservation, contact us in advance of your reservation, or let us know when you arrive. Just outside Philadelphia in the King of Prussia Town Center, Founding Farmers King of Prussia is located on the second floor with access via an elevator or stairs. (The first floor is our First Bake Cafe & Creamery, which also has some counter seating, several cafe tables, and a seasonal outdoor patio.) There are multiple free parking lots and street parking surrounding the restaurant. We offer valet parking in the evenings.
